value.name: Who's new? Jetson Paul Smith
value.description: Ian and Shayna Smith, Moundridge, announce the birth of their son Jetson Paul Smith. He was born April 24, 2021, at NMC Health, Newton. He weighed 6 pounds, 5.7 ounces and was 19 inches long. Maternal grandparents are Warren and Jerri Kaufman,

value.name: In Mattapan, a call for national and local reform in the name of George Floyd
value.description: A few hundred people gather at Mattapan's Walker Playground after a march from Milton to Norfolk Street to mark the one-year anniversary of George Floyd's murder by a Minneapolis police officer. Photo by Rebeca Pereira The metallic rush of steel percussion ­– the instrumentation of Hyde Park’s Branches Steel Orchestra – swelled as hundreds of people descended on Walker Playground on Tuesday evening for the final leg of the March for George and Justice.

value.name: Officer's resignation accepted by board
value.description: Scott Caudill, Mitchell McKinney and Paul Smith were promoted to deputy chief; Sgts. Daniel Ingram and Sofia Rosales-Scatena to captain. Officer Christopher Faherty was promoted to sergeant.
